author: Maggie Pehanick
title: Bates Motel Returns Tonight! Here's What You Need to Know
text:
Bates Motel Season 5 Details Bates Motel Returns Tonight! Here's What You Need to Know February 20, 2017 Share This Link Copy What’s Your Reaction? Thanks for your reaction Don’t forget to share this with your friends! ← Use Arrows Keys → 1 Bates Motel Returns Tonight! Here's What You Need to Know 
The final season of Bates Motel is shaping up to be its most explosive yet. Over the course of four seasons, we've seen Norman blossom from a weird young boy to a serious creep , and he's finally graduated to full-on psychopath. Now that the premiere is upon us, take a look at the bushel of details we have about what to expect — including Rihanna ! Here's the rundown, plus the creepy-as-hell teaser. Related:
